title: the good snickerdoodles
steps: In a stand mixer, add butter, sugar, and vanilla extract. Beat until creamy.
Add eggs one at a time.
Add cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon, and mix them in just a little.
Slowly add flour and mix. Dough will be very wet.
Chill until dough is firm -- can take anywhere from 4 hours to overnight.
In a separate bowl, combine coarse granulated sugar and ground cinnamon. For the strongest flavor, the mixture should be around the color of yeast or sand.
After chilled, use a cookie scoop or rounded spoon to form uniform balls of dough about 1" in diameter.
Use hands to roll into a smooth ball, then roll in the cinnamon sugar mixture.
Bake for 8 minutes, turning halfway through.
